item.title: [GRA2][Web Hosting] - Maintenance on all cluster
item.description:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Mar 20, 21:00 UTC  -  Mar 21, 00:00 UTC

Feb 28, 14:47 UTC
Update - We have new information regarding the maintenance.

Please find below an update on the situation:
New start time : 20/03/2025 21:00 UTC
End time : 21/03/2025 00:00 UTC
Service impact : During this maintenance, you may experience some disruptions to our services on all impacted clusters. Specifically:
• Suspension of traffic from AI and content indexing bots and crawlers on all impacted clusters: To prevent any potential issues, we will temporarily suspend traffic from AI and content indexing bots and crawlers on all impacted clusters.
• Possible slowness on perso/pro offers : You may notice slower loading times or delayed responses when accessing your website or applications.
In addition :
• Possible slowness on metrics or logs on clusters 002 / 005 / 007 / 010 / 012 / 013 / 014 / 017 : Metrics and logs access may be delayed or slow during the maintenance period.
• Possible slowness on mails on clusters 005 / 017 : Sending mail from websites may be delayed or slow during the maintenance period.
• Slowness on operations on clusters 011 / 014 / 017
Service improvement : This maintenance is link to : https://network.status-ovhcloud.com/incidents/ndkfnxy1ylv4

We apologize for any inconvenience caused and appreciate your understanding.

item.title: [Global][Domains] - Domains Name incident notification on .DK
item.description:
Mar 11, 12:55 UTC
Resolved - We would like to inform you that the incident on our Web Cloud offer has now been resolved.

Mar 9, 12:22 UTC

Mar 4, 07:53 UTC
Identified - The issue has been identified and a fix is being implemented.
Start time : 03/03/2025 07:35 UTC
Service impact : Customer with a .dk domains name are unable to perform some tasks.

Mar 3, 09:27 UTC
Update - We are currently experiencing an incident affecting our Domains, customers in the impacted zone are unable to perform some tasks.

Here is detail for this incident :
Start time : 03/03/2025 07:35 UTC
Impacted Service(s) : Multiple operations (Registration, Renew, Transfer, Restore, Delete) are temporarily unavailable for .DK domains.
Customers Impact : Customers are temporarily unable to perform multiple operations (Registration, Renew, Transfer, Restore, Delete).
Please note that websites are still available.
Unfortunately, customers who want to renew their .DK domain name after the expiration date is already passed will have their websites unavailable.
Ongoing Actions : Our teams are investigating to determine the origin of the incident to fix it.

Our teams are fully engaged and working to resolve the issue as quickly as possible. We will keep you updated on the progress and resolution.
We apologize for any inconvenience caused and appreciate your understanding.

Mar 3, 09:07 UTC
Investigating - We are currently experiencing an event affecting our Web Cloud offer.
Start time : 03/03/2025 07:35 UTC

Our teams are fully committed to investigating this issue and working towards a resolution as soon as possible. As investigations are ongoing, we will share any new findings or updates with you as soon as possible.

We apologize for any inconvenience caused and appreciate your understanding.

Customers Impact : Customers are temporarily unable to perform multiple operations (Registration, Renew, Transfer, Restore, Delete).
Please note that websites are still available.
Unfortunately, customers who want to renew their .COM.AU domain name after the expiration date is already passed will have their websites unavailable.
Ongoing Actions : The issue has been identified and a fix is being implemented.

Our teams are fully engaged and working to resolve the issue as quickly as possible. We will keep you updated on the progress and resolution.
We apologize for any inconvenience caused and appreciate your understanding.

item.title: [GRA2/1][WebHosting] - Maintenance notification for multiple Filerz
item.description:
Mar 6, 00:06 UTC
Completed - The scheduled maintenance has been completed.

Mar 5, 22:00 UTC
In progress - Scheduled maintenance is currently in progress. We will provide updates as necessary.

Feb 27, 16:12 UTC
Scheduled - As part of our continuous improvement plan, maintenance is scheduled on our Web Hosting Offer.

Start time : 05/03/2025 22:00 UTC
End time : 06/03/2025 05:00 UTC
Service impact : Filerz following will be unavailable one by one during 20 minutes.
Cluster020- Filerz71
Cluster023 - Filerz707
Cluster026 - Filerz1884
Cluster023 - Filerz148
Cluster003 - Filerz890
Cluster007 - Filerz396
Service improvement : We are going to reboot the Filerz one by one (Web Hosting server) to improve the performance and stability of the service.

Thank you for your understanding.
